recipe_name: Brown Sugar and Pineapple Glazed Ham
ingredients: 1 (6 pound) fully-cooked, bone-in ham, 1  fresh pineapple, 2 (6 ounce) cans pineapple juice, 1 cup brown sugar
nutrition: Total Fat 26g 33%, Saturated Fat 9g 45%, Cholesterol 99mg 33%, Sodium 68mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 16g 6%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 15g, Protein 24g, Vitamin C 14mg 70%, Calcium 21mg 2%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 492mg 10%
